title: Open Resource Control and Surveillance Toolkit (ORCS)
desc: A cross-platform dashboard to view real-time CPU and Memory usage of multiple systems and itâ€™s processes. title: IoT Project
desc: Built a IoT project that can control electrical appliances using a online platform 'Blynk' and also integrated it with Google Assistant for voice control.
